description: A luxury craft cocktail bar landing page for the fictional brand VERDIGRIS. Warm copper-amber palette on near-black background, Hero Type G scroll-driven word split (COP/PER), copper particle canvas animation, lab-notebook menu, atelier process Swiper, and private members section.
heroDescription: Scroll-driven text transform: COP/PER word pair splits apart horizontally on scroll with opacity fade. 200vh hero with sticky viewport.
